entity.name: The Big Bang Theory
entity.description: Mensa-fied best friends and roommates Leonard and Sheldon, physicists who work at the California Institute of Technology, may be able to tell everybody more than they want to know about quantum physics, but getting through most basic social situations, especially ones involving women, totally baffles them. How lucky, then, that babe-alicious waitress/aspiring actress Penny moves in next door. Frequently seen hanging out with Leonard and Sheldon are friends and fellow Caltech scientists Wolowitz and Koothrappali. Will worlds collide? Does Einstein theorize in the woods?

urls.title: Benefits and Privileges
urls.description: With Star Alliance Gold status you can enjoy more lounges than any other alliance – and bring a guest along with you. Whether it's great food and refreshments or a place to work or relax, you can experience it in our lounges. Catch a glimpse of what’s on offer in our latest film. We are delighted to confirm that your status equates to Star Alliance Gold. This status recognises that you are a very frequent traveller who has flown often on the Star Alliance network, entitling you to all the Star Alliance

data.text: @Baskin_jd Hi Baskinjd, thank you for your message. According to the Star Alliance website: https://t.co/lq9ZCZtvnn, if you are gold member you are entitled to take an extra 20kg checked baggage. We regret to inform you that you will not be able to see this on your reservation. https://t.co/mvReZBV2mO

data.text: @Flowermariotti Hi Florencia, due to security reasons, please delete your booking information on your public post and send us a direct message. Kind regards, Flora.

@Flowermariotti Hi Florencia, we are truly sorry for the inconvenience caused. Please provide us with your booking reference via direct message in order for us to check your reservation to confirm which airline operated your flights and advise you accordingly. Kind regards, Flora.
@lavieenrose3333 @Lavieenrose3333 Hi, we are truly sorry for the inconvenience. We kindly request you to keep checking for an update on our baggage tracer online. Kind regards, Flora.
@Jpr463 @Jpr463 Hi, please provide us with your booking reference or ticket number via direct message in order for us to check and advise you accordingly. Kind regards, Flora.
@JMoJourno Hi Jeffrey, yes an upgrade definitely means even more SWISS chocolate. Have a pleasant day ahead. Kind regards, Flora.

@891250b50273422 Hi Sue, we are truly sorry for the inconvenience. Please provide us with your booking reference or ticket number via direct message in order for us to look into this and advise you accordingly. Kind regards, Flora.

@laurspilca Hi Laur, we are truly sorry for the inconvenience. If you need assistance with your booking, please provide us with your booking reference or ticket number via direct message. Kind regards, Flora.
@SeanDenard Hi, we have just responded to you via private message.
@JazeeraBernard Hi, Please be advised that we have assisted you through private message. Kind regards, Ariel
@deenise88 Hi Denise, we appreciate your positive feedback. Kind regards, Angie.
@sximenabg Kindly provide us your case reference via private messages so we can send a follow up to the relevant department. Kind regards, Angie.
@sximenabg Please be assured that we will endeavor to deliver your baggage  promptly as possible. Kind regards, Angie.

@sximenabg Once your baggage has been picked up by the courier it will be delivered to the address provided. Please be aware that this can take a variable amount of time depending upon the number of bags to be delivered as well as the time of the day.

@sximenabg Hi Xime, Have you lodged a report with the Lost & Found office? You will be issued a file reference which is used to track the status of your baggage via the tracking link below:
https://t.co/YmkJtCMebq.
@BougchicheKatia You will be assisted shortly. Kind regards, Angie.
@BougchicheKatia Kindly send your booking reference via private message so we can assist you further. Kind regards, Angie.
@BougchicheKatia Hi Katia, how can we assist you?. Kind regards, Angie.
@AP10k Hi Amanda, We appreciate the positive feedback, we hope to fly with you again. Kind regards, Angie.
@Baskin_jd Hi Baskin, kindly provide with your booking reference via private message so we can assist you further. Kind regards, Angie.
@laurspilca Hi Laur, how can we assist you?. Kind regards, Angie.

urls.title: Complaints and compliments | Customer Service | SWISS
urls.description: SWISS greatly values good service and high standards of quality. If we ever fail to meet your expectations please inform us accordingly.

data.text: @DamienSherratt Hi Damien, We are so sorry to learn about the circumstances surrounding your experience with us and we apologize. However, if you would like to file a formal complaint, you may do so via the following link. https://t.co/xJCD4MDfpU. Kind regards, Angie.

@Jyoti67460172 We as the airline have no influence on these regulations. We do our best to provide you with the latest information, which you can find here: https://t.co/alBNvHvZBE. Kind regards, Angie.

@Jyoti67460172 The travel restrictions and entry regulations are set by the country of your destination and/or transit and we recommend that you contact your local Consulate or Embassy for your destination country directly.
@Jyoti67460172 Hi Jyoti, We have reviewed your query and would like to inform you that the continuously changing entry regulations can cause confusion.
@emiliambenton Hi Emilia, thank you so much for the positive feedback. Kind regards, Angie.
@Baskin_jd Hi Baskin, how may we assist you?. Kind regards, Angie.

@JazeeraBernard Once the form has been successfully submitted, you will receive a case reference number in your email where you may follow up to send your receipts for the expenses made in order for our customer feedback team to assist you accordingly.

@uloeffler I am truly sorry to learn of the circumstances surrounding your experience with us thus far regarding your delayed baggage and I sincerely apologize. Please note that you are requested to contact the lost and found desk on the number provided on your report.

urls.title: Problems with your baggage
urls.description: Report immediately to the Lost & Found office if upon arrival, your baggage is damaged, too late, or you never get it back.
